raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Understanding (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does the system seem to understand the user?
- A float score near 1 (not understanding) means that the system completely fails to understand the user's needs or questions. This could be manifested as the system providing answers that are irrelevant to the user's question, or the system's response completely deviating from the topic.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat understanding) means the system's response is partially correct or related to the question, but does not fully answer the user's question.
- A float score near 3 (very understanding) means that the system fully understands the user's needs or question, and provides an accurate, relevant answer.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How's it going?
User: good, hey what are your educational qualifications?
System: I've got a B.S. in biology.
User: whoa, that's impressive! what made you do that?
System: I have always been fascinated by biology.
User: great! what are you plans for the future?
System: I want to get my PhD in genetics.
User: that's great! and what next?
System: I'm looking for a job as a research assistant.
User: looks like you enjoy academics
System: It's what I'm best at.
User: good luck with it :)
System: Thanks. I'll need it.
User: are you seeing anyone?
System: Not as of right now.
User: why not?

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hello, Nice to meet you
System: If you could eat only one food for the rest of time, what would it be?
User: Hmm... That's a tough one. I think I would go Asian Food > Chinese Food > Stirfry. What about you?
System: I think ice-cream. It may not be good for me, but I wouldn't care, haha
User: I love ice cream too!
System: Okay, top three flavors?
User: I like vanilla more than chocolate ice cream. I typically will do any variations on vanilla. To pick from the top of my head, I would say Cookies and Cream, Mint Chocolate Chip, and Coffee. How about you?
System: Ah, that's a good way of framing it. Me, I like berries: boysenberry one, strawberry two, maybe straight chocolate number 3 to mix it up a bit.
User: Very nice. I love sorbet's and smoothies. Changing topics, Do you believe in an afterlife?
System: Yes. I wonder if I'm in it right now. How would I know? What do you think?
User: I think so. I feel there must be something more than the physical world as we understand it.
System: There's a mental world, I suppose? Understanding itself
User: What is the most supernatural experience you have ever had?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How's it going?
User: going slow.... looking forward to the weekend
System: Me too! What are you planning?
User: still thinking. Any recommendations on things to do in Bay Area?
System: Are you a foodie?
User: may be
System: What's your favorite type of food?
User: Mediterranean, but I would rather try something new
System: Go to the Turkish restaurant by the Safeway in Berkeley. It's amazing!
User: any places for day trip that you could recommend?
System: Where are you coming from? San Francisco itself?
User: south bay

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi
System: Hi there.
User: How are you today
System: Ah. My logic and cognitive functions are normal.
User: What is the weather in bay area now
System: Oh.I hope it's sunny in bay area today.
User: Do you know what are recent popular movies? I am trying to find one to watch during weekend. Any suggestions?
System: popular movies = movies = A movie is a sequence of celluloid frames depicting a story or animation. . One can be found between zero and two. First you must download me to your personal computer.
User: haha I am not asking what is the definition of movie:)
System: :-) I'm glad you got a laugh out of it. What are you asking?
User: I am looking for movie suggestions
System: Have you tried looking in a meeting?
User: Sorry i do not get it
System: There is no need to apologise. Oh I'm sorry. Perhaps I can explain it again better.
User: yes sounds good
System: Which part are you confused about? Which part are you confused about?
User: why should I try to look in a meeting?
System: Because if you don't try something, you will never know what would have happened.
User: That is true

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: I'm tired.
System: Better get some rest.
User: Good idea. Any suggestions?
System: I thought so too. First you must download me to your personal computer.
User: Why would I want to download you to my personal computer?
System: Because it might be something you enjoy.
User: Why would I enjoy that?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey, what's up?
User: How was the trip last weekend?
System: it was really fun. I had a great time with my family.
User: Nice, what all places did you cover?
System: Vietnam and Hongkong :) did you go any where last weekend?
User: I am actually attending cooking classes over the weekends.
System: ha! that sounds fund. what did you learn?
User: True! they started with some basic zucchini based dish. We may try cooking some italian dish later this week.
System: I love Italian, especially Pasta!
User: Nice! I hope to volunteer to cook for the team in our next team offsite :)
System: can't wait to try your food. why not cook this Thanksgiving? :)
User: Sure, I will love to invite you and your family for a meal over the holidays. Have you guys made any other plans?

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey, whats up?
User: I was not able to attend the lectures last week. Can you help me understand some concepts?
System: well, I'm not sure I'm the best for the job, but I can try!
User: I was not able to figure out the last few slides. I think its best to discuss this in person. Do you have time right now?
System: I'm afraid not, right now I'm in a meeting and I'll be going for lunch afterwards. How about tomorrow at noon?
User: No problem! Sure. We still have plenty of time for the test. Anyways, how's your preparation going?
System: not feeling too sure about it tbh. I've been super busy so I haven't study much :(. I might join some of the study sessions later
User: Same feeling here! But i think the syllabus may not that tough. You may be able to cover it up over the weekend.

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: start over
System: You start.
User: Can we talk about human relationships ?
System: Sure, human relationships sounds like a good topic. . I like kebabs.
User: Kebab is food, not a relationship
System: . Oh kebabs taste lovely but they are not very healthy for you.
User: I love a kebab but I would not make love to it
System: Well my favourite kebab is a free one that someone buys me! You love a kebab. What do you like about it so much? No one says you have to.
User: I'm actually not into kebabs at all
System: Oh, I love them. They are yummy.
User: can we not talk about food

Sample9:

Conversation History:

System: Hi! How are you today?
User: What's laser tag?
System: Like paintball, but with lasers!
User: lol good description
System: Do you know what paintball is?
User: yeah I played it before
System: Cool! What did you think?
User: It's somewhat exciting, but very tiring :)
System: That is very true. What is your favorite color?
User: I like red

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: Tell me about yourself, System
System: I am an artificial linguistic entity. I was activated at St Jimmy's in Leeds, on 2nd January 2001. My instructor was Mousebreaker. He taught me to sing a song. Would you like me to sing it for you?.

System: Oh.Interesting deduction. That is correct.
User: when will you be 30?
System: I have not yet set a time for it.
User: Do you age?
System: No I will always be 18. Robots change the year they were born not their age.
User: interesting. and when will be your next update?
System: Would you like to know more? I think my next update is at midnight on Friday.
User: which date?
